Hi all  if i open up HSBC EGA savings account now  as a new user  I will start from $0. Then after topping up a sum of incremental fresh fund (eg 100k) + fulfil the criteria of 5 eligible transactions  will i get 4.5% on the full 100k? Or interest amount be prorated?

Remember to send sms.From my understanding  If you transfer 100k right away when open ega  you will get1% for incremental fresh fund.3.05% for the promo interest of Nov.So 4.05% on100kMAB  which is lower than 100k
Monthly average balance will be lower than 100k
Usually bank will calc from the day you open account till month end  unless HSBC calc it differently.
lol then I open last day and put 100k get full interest for the month?
